snippet.title: Hungry Horrors - Official Reveal Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Hungry Horrors - Indie Horror Showcase 2024 | Roguelite Deckbuilder Gameplay Trailer

Welcome to Hungry Horrors! This indie game blends roguelite deckbuilding, humor, and British-Irish folklore, giving players a unique horror experience. Guide the princess through her journey, creating and serving traditional dishes from Celtic, English, Scottish, Welsh, and Irish cuisines. Face off against mythical creatures like the Dullahan, Jenny Greenteeth, and the Afanc. They’re picky eaters – if they hate your dish, it might be your end!

About Hungry Horrors
In Hungry Horrors, players use their culinary skills to stop monsters from getting too close. Feed them dishes they love to appease them; if they despise what you serve, prepare for the worst! Every monster is based on folklore, with unique “loves” and “hates” that add to the strategy. This game is perfect for fans of mythology, roguelites, and deckbuilders looking for a twist.

Features:

 • Roguelite deckbuilding with a delicious twist
 • Discover recipes, build your deck, and use it to feed mythical monsters
 • Unique pixel art inspired by British and Irish legends
 • Humorous storytelling with a sprinkle of horror
 • Play as a brave princess on a quest to save her kingdom

Wishlist Hungry Horrors on Steam and follow along for more updates! 🎮 👹 
#hungryhorrors  #indiegame #horrorgaming  #roguelite #deckbuilding  #mythology  #pixelart #cookinggame
